data.comment: The match is underway at Ciutat de Valencia.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 1, Getafe to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Levante throw-in in Getafe's half.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In the minute 4, Levante are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 5, Roger Marti puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jorge De Frutos Sebastian to set up the goal.
Chema (Getafe) has been sent off!
In the minute 10, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Djene (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Angel Rodriguez (Getafe) has received a first yellow card.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
In the minute 14, Jaime Mata for Getafe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Levante have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 16, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's now 2-0 in Valencia as Dani Gomez scores for Levante.
In the minute 17, That's a fine assist from Carlos Clerc.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Valencia.
In the minute 21, In Valencia Getafe attack through Mauro Arambarri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Getafe.
At Ciutat de Valencia, Jaime Mata for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
The away team have replaced Jaime Mata with Xabier Etxeita. This is the first substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Getafe's Cucho Hernandez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Getafe needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Levante's Jorge De Frutos Sebastian is on target but unsuccessful.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 33, David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe at Ciutat de Valencia.
Getafe are coming forward and Cucho Hernandez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Levante have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In Valencia, Ruben Rochina of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 42, David Medie Jimenez awards Getafe a goal kick.
Getafe advance rapidly upfield but David Medie Jimenez blows for offside.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Levante.
Getafe's Mauro Arambarri breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, David Medie Jimenez awards Levante a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Ciutat de Valencia.
Mauro Arambarri (Getafe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
David Medie Jimenez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Getafe.
Levante have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
In the minute 47, Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Levante's Jorge De Frutos Sebastian breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Getafe at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 49, Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Allan Nyom for Getafe has been booked by David Medie Jimenez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, In Valencia, Levante push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Dani Gomez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 51, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 52, David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Levante's area.
At Ciutat de Valencia, Roger Marti has been yellow-carded for the home team.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Getafe.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Levante extend their lead to 3-0 through Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
In the minute 57, Roger Marti with an assist there.
Getafe are caught offside.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Getafe throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
The home team replace Nikola Vukcevic with Mickael Malsa.
Jose Luis Morales is replacing Dani Gomez for the home team.
In the minute 60, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Getafe.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe's Angel Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Levante have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a second substitution, with Nemanja Maksimovic replacing Allan Nyom.
Enes Ünal is on a sub for Cucho Hernandez for Getafe.
In the minute 66, Pepe Bordalas is making the team's fourth substitution at Ciutat de Valencia with Victor Mollejo replacing Mathias Olivera.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Getafe just outside Levante's area.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 71, Angel Rodriguez (Getafe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jorge De Frutos Sebastian of Levante smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Jorge Miramon is replacing Coke for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Sergio Leon is replacing Roger Marti for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Djene (Getafe) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Levante drives forward and Mickael Malsa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 81, Sergio Leon (Levante) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Paco Lopez is making the team's fifth substitution at Ciutat de Valencia with Edgar Sevikyan replacing Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Valencia.
In the minute 84, Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a fifth substitution, with John Joe Patrick Finn replacing Angel Rodriguez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 86, Getafe have a goal kick.
Getafe are in shooting range from this free kick.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 88, Marc Cucurella (Getafe) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 89, Jose Luis Morales of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
David Medie Jimenez awards Getafe a goal kick.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Levante.
David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Getafe's area.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
